data.title: Zach Randolph Player Profile, Dallas Mavericks
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Zach Randolph on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 27, 2001 - The Portland Trail Blazers selected Zach Randolph in Round 1 with Pick 19 in the 2001 NBA Draft. Aug 21, 2001 - Zach Randolph signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Nov 1, 2003 - The Portland Trail Blazers exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Zach Randolph. Nov 1, 2004 - Zach Randolph signed a rookie scale extension with the Portland Trail Blazers. Jun 28, 2007 - Zach Randolph was acquired by the New York Knicks, along with Dan Dickau, Fred Jones, the draft rights to Demetris Nichols and a TPE, from the Portland Trail Blazers in exchange for Steve Francis, Channing Frye and a 2008 2nd round pick (NYK own). Nov 21, 2008 - Zach Randolph was acquired by the Los Angeles Clippers, along with Mardy Collins, from the New York Knicks in exchange for Cuttino Mobley and Tim Thomas. Jul 17, 2009 - Zach Randolph was acquired by the Memphis Grizzlies from the Los Angeles Clippers in exchange for Quentin Richardson. Apr 20, 2011 - Zach Randolph signed a veteran extension with the Memphis Grizzlies. Jun 27, 2014 - Zach Randolph exercised a Player Option to extend his contract. Jun 30, 2014 - Zach Randolph signed a veteran extension with the Memphis Grizzlies. Jul 1, 2017 - Zach Randolph, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Jul 10, 2017 - Zach Randolph signed a multi-year contract with the Sacramento Kings. Feb 7, 2019 - Zach Randolph was acquired by the Dallas Mavericks, along with Justin Jackson and a TPE, from the Sacramento Kings in exchange for Harrison Barnes and a TPE. Feb 8, 2019 - The Dallas Mavericks placed the contract of Zach Randolph on waivers.
